bboxes.reason: The bounding box with index 8 fully encompasses the pressing area of the physical 'MENU' button, meeting the selection criteria for button elements.
The bounding box with index 2 correctly covers the 'GLUTEN FREE' button's label area, which is identified as the control element for interaction.
Bounding box 6 captures the 'CRUST COLOUR' button region more comprehensively than bounding box 4, including both parts of the label text, which defines the soft pad's execution area.
Bounding box 7 encompasses the entire physical button for 'Start Cancel,' making it the best fit per the Button Selection Criteria.
The bounding box with index 9 best covers the area of the digital display as a whole, which includes the crucial feedback information related to the control element.
The bounding box with index 10 captures the execution area, which is the 'LOAF SIZE' labeled button. This button is interactive and matches the criteria for the 'loaf_size_button' control element.

Bounding box 11 captures the physical button area with the up arrow symbol, which corresponds to the timer_up_button. Bounding box 18 only covers a portion of the arrow symbol, making it less complete.
Bounding box 12 best encompasses the timer_down_button's pressing area with its down arrow label, which is an interactive button area.
